| History                 = The '''Murder-Clans''' were a group whose chieftain [[Brutus Klor (Earth-616)|Brutus Klor]] was part of the [[Lords of the Splinter Realms (Earth-616)|Lords of the Splinter Realms]].{{r|Magik #3}}

Brutus Klor and the Murder Clans ruled over a realm adjacent to the [[Farallah (Dimension)|dimension of Farallah]], dwelling of the entity [[Farallah (Earth-616)|Farallah]], whom they served.{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 12|; Mystic Dimensions - From the Journals of Ian McNee: The [[Archipelago of Anguish and Redemption|Splinter Realms (The Dark Dimension, the Archipelago of Anguish and Redemption)]], [[Farallah (Dimension)|Farallah]]'s entry}}
